argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_repsf | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( S repeatS N ) : ( 0 ..^ N ) --> V ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( S repeatS N ) : ( 0 ..^ N ) --> V -> ( S repeatS N ) Fn ( 0 ..^ N ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_hashfn | |- ( ( S repeatS N ) Fn ( 0 ..^ N ) -> ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = ( # ` ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = ( # ` ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_hashfzo0 | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( # ` ( 0 ..^ N ) ) = N ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( # ` ( 0 ..^ N ) ) = N ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = N ) |
